about.title: About Me
about.content: Passionate AI engineer and aspiring database administrator with hands-on experience in Hugging Face, LangChain, Gradio, SQL, UiPath, and pandas. I specialize in building intelligent systems and automating data workflows — merging data integrity with smart automation.
